snippet: Pablo Cuevas and Guido Pella will face off in the final of the Rio Open after beating highly favored opponents in the semifinals to get there....
lead_paragraph: Pablo Cuevas and Guido Pella will face off in the final of the Rio Open after beating highly favored opponents in the semifinals to get there.

headline.print_headline: Cuevas, Pella Into Rio Open Final; Nadal and Thiem Beaten
headline.main: Cuevas, Pella Into Rio Open Final; Nadal and Thiem Beaten
